summary: This is just a simple mod that removes the need to recharge Auriel\'s Bow from the dlc Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a simple mod that removes the need to recharge Auriel\'s Bow from the dlc Dawnguard. This mod will work with both Sunhallowed Arrows and Bloodcursed Arrows.

NMM Installation:
Use Download with Manager button 

Manual Installation:
Open the .rar file and drop the Data folder into your Skyrim directory, then open the Skyrim launcher and open up \"Data Files\". Make sure that Auriels Bow Unlimited Charge.esp is checked.
author: TwixMan
